text: House on Wagstaff Farm is a historic home located near Roxboro, Person County, North Carolina. It is dated to the early-19th century, and is a 1 1/2-story, single-pile, frame dwelling. The interior has a hall-parlor plan and transitional Georgian / Federal style detailing. It has a side gable roof and stone and brick gable end chimneys. The house was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 2005. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Federal architecture in North Carolina Category:Georgian architecture in North Carolina Category:Houses in Person County, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Person County, North Carolina
title: House on Wagstaff Farm
